update.sql: update kns_redu set txnsts = #newTxnsts#,errocd = #errocd# where inpudt = #inpudt# and inpusq = #inpusq# and txnsts = #oldTxnsts#

update.longname: 更新日终批量执行明细表完成任务百分比
update.sql: UPDATE aps_eodt_detl a SET a.pecent = #pecent# WHERE a.corpno = #corpno# AND a.flowid = #flowid# AND a.flowdt = #flowdt#

update.longname: 更新日终批量执行明细表
update.sql: update aps_eodt_detl a set a.dcnste=#dcnste#, a.txntal=#txntal#, a.pecent=#pecent#, a.tmstmp=#tmstmp# where a.corpno=#corpno# and a.flowid=#flowid# and a.systcd=#systcd# and a.dcnnum=#dcnnum# and a.flowdt = #flowdt#

update aps_eodt_detl a set a.dcnste=#dcnste#, a.txntal=#txntal#, a.pecent=#pecent#, a.tmstmp=#tmstmp# where a.corpno=#corpno# and a.flowid=#flowid# and a.systcd=#systcd# and a.dcnnum=#dcnnum# and a.flowdt = #flowdt#

update.longname: 更新日终批量日期管理表状态
update.sql: UPDATE apb_eodt a SET a.flowst = '1' ,a.tmstmp=#tmstmp# WHERE a.corpno = #corpno# AND a.flowid = #flowid# AND a.systcd=#systcd# AND a.flowdt = #flowdt#

update.longname: 更新日初成功后日终批量日期管理表管理日期
update.sql: UPDATE apb_eodt a SET a.flowdt = #flowdt# ,a.flowst = '0',a.tmstmp=#tmstmp# WHERE a.corpno = #corpno# AND a.flowtp = '0' AND a.systcd=#systcd#
UPDATE apb_eodt a SET a.flowdt = #flowdt# ,a.flowst = '0',a.tmstmp=#tmstmp# WHERE a.corpno = #corpno# AND a.flowtp = '0' AND a.systcd=#systcd#

update.longname: 更新单流程日终批量日期管理表管理日期
update.sql: UPDATE apb_eodt a SET a.flowdt = #flowdt# ,a.flowst = '0' ,a.tmstmp=#tmstmp# WHERE a.corpno = #corpno# AND a.flowid=#flowid# AND a.systcd=#systcd#

update.longname: 更新日终日切成功后日终批量日期管理表管理日期
update.sql: UPDATE apb_eodt a SET a.flowdt = #flowdt#,a.flowst='0',a.tmstmp=#tmstmp# WHERE a.corpno = #corpno# AND a.flowtp = #flowtp# AND a.systcd=#systcd#
UPDATE apb_eodt a SET a.flowdt = #flowdt#,a.flowst='0',a.tmstmp=#tmstmp# WHERE a.corpno = #corpno# AND a.flowtp = #flowtp# AND a.systcd=#systcd#

update.longname: 更新日终明细表的成功个数
update.sql: update aps_eodt_detl a set a.txnsuc=a.txnsuc +1 where a.corpno=#corpno# and a.flowid=#flowid# and a.systcd=#systcd# and a.dcnnum=#dcnnum# and a.flowdt = #flowdt#
